channel.title: Some difficult tasks
channel.description:
hey, i was wondering if it was possible to add another staff rank, i mean i know there's player=0 mod=1 admin=2 but i wanted to make a few more, idk for exmaple for a "donater" rank, or a "veteran rank" or a "skiller rank" or wtever, and for example if it was possible then to make a person with all the skills lvl maxed out then how can i make it so they can tele to a new area?
would anyon know ow to do any of this? like make a new rank but with the player=0 so that the person doesnt have any benefuts, i only want it so the person has a custom crown.

item.title: Some difficult tasks
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

dude ud be better off adding commands for them like ::skiller and making it so only certain players can use it, or ud have to rewrite that entire player method

Read full topic

item.title: Some difficult tasks
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

You do know you should be more specific when asking these things… it saves everyone alot of time;
I guess your using a 508+ cause you didn’t mention playerrights 3 and post exactly the rank you want so we can help u easier

Read full topic
